name: ZIC: Zombies In City Shooter
description:
«The zombies come at night, out of the fog... Zombie infection spread throughout the undead city and initiated a zombie apocalypse. Zombies ate my friends... The deadly virus has not touched only us and now only we the hope for all of humanity. We must stop zombie infection!»

ZIC: Zombies In City — it's first person shooter and zombie survival games genre. As the city is infected with zombie virus. Four characters unite to stand against zombie attack. Main goal - surviving in zombie apocalypse and safe world.

Walking dead everywhere... Life will bring together different people in the zombie killer squad, able to withstand the onslaught of the walking dead!

Game Features:
- Endless story mode — interesting storyline about escaped survivors;
- Zombie killer squad: 4 heroes with unique character and history;
- 10 different zombie types, monsters and enemy marauder;
- Large selection of letal guns — chainsaw, uzi, grenade, rocket launcher, AK-47, baton, machete, bat, pistol, revolver;
- The change of day and night, boundless open world for exploration;
- Characters voices, cutscenes and easter eggs;
